    • Method Detail

      • getRound

        public Optional<Round> getRound()
        Get the round of the block if the protocol version is 6 or above
        Returns:
        return the round if present otherwise nothing.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the protocol version is unrecognized.

      • getEpoch

        public Optional<Epoch> getEpoch()
        Get the epoch of the block if the protocol version is 6 or above.
        Returns:
        the epoch if present otherwise nothing.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the protocol version is unrecognized.

      • getBlockHash

        public Hash getBlockHash()
        Hash of the Block.
        Overrides:
        getBlockHash in class BlockIdentifier

        Absolute Block Height.

      • builder

        public static BlockInfo.BlockInfoBuilder<?,?> builder()

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class BlockIdentifier

      • getTransactionEnergyCost

        public Integer getTransactionEnergyCost()
        The total energy consumption of transactions in the block.

      • getBlockBaker

        public BakerId getBlockBaker()
        Identity of the baker of the block. For non-genesis blocks the value is non-null.

      • getBlockStateHash

        public Hash getBlockStateHash()
        Hash of the block state at the end of the given block.

      • getBlockTime

        public Timestamp getBlockTime()
        Time of the block is in. In contrast to blockArriveTime this is an objective value, all nodes agree on it.

      • getBlockParent

        public Hash getBlockParent()
        Parent block pointer.

      • getBlockReceiveTime

        public Timestamp getBlockReceiveTime()
        Time when the block was first received by the node. This can be in principle quite different from the arrive time if, e.g., block execution takes a long time, or the block must wait for the arrival of its parent.

      • getGenesisIndex

        public Integer getGenesisIndex()
        The genesis index for this block. This counts the number of protocol updates that have preceded this block, and defines the era of the block.

      • getBlockSlot

        public Integer getBlockSlot()
        Slot number of the slot the block is in.

      • getFinalized

        public Boolean getFinalized()
        Whether the block is finalized or not.

      • getEraBlockHeight

        public Integer getEraBlockHeight()
        The height of this block relative to the (re)genesis block of its era.

      • getBlockLastFinalized

        public Hash getBlockLastFinalized()
        Pointer to the last finalized block. Each block has a pointer to a specific finalized block that existed at the time the block was produced.

      • getTransactionsSize

        public Integer getTransactionsSize()
        Size of all the transactions in the block in bytes.

      • getTransactionCount

        public Integer getTransactionCount()
        The number of transactions in the block.

      • getBlockArriveTime

        public Timestamp getBlockArriveTime()
        Time when the block was added to the node's tree. This is a subjective (i.e., node specific) value.

      • getProtocolVersion

        public ProtocolVersion getProtocolVersion()
        The protocol version that the block was baked in.
